definition: Heaven helps the worthy (idiom)
pinyin: ji2 ren2 zi4 you3 tian1 xiang4

definition: lucky/giga- (meaning billion or 10^9)
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
day/sky/heaven
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: Don't too worry. A cat has nine lives.
sentences.chinese: 不要太过于担心，吉人自有天相。

definition: see 吉人自有天相[ji2 ren2 zi4 you3 tian1 xiang4]
one is bound for good fortune after surviving a great disaster (proverb)
pinyin: da4 nan4 bu4 si3 , bi4 you3 hou4 fu2

definition: safe and sound (idiom)
misfortune turns to blessing (idiom); to turn an inauspicious start to good account
life and death are ruled by fate (idiom)
if only it were so/I hope so (idiom)
virtue has its rewards (idiom); one good turn deserves another
planning is with man, accomplishing with heaven (idiom); Man proposes but God disposes.
pinyin: mou2 shi4 zai4 ren2 , cheng2 shi4 zai4 tian1

definition: fortune favors fools (idiom)/fool's luck
flood of good fortune fills the heavens (idiom); a lucky sign

lit. When we get to the mountain, there'll be a way through. (idiom)/fig. Everything will turn out for the best./Let's worry about it when it happens./It will be all right on the night./cf couplet 車到山前必有路，船到橋頭自然直|车到山前必有路，船到桥头自然直
pinyin: che1 dao4 shan1 qian2 bi4 you3 lu4

definition: Heaven never bars one's way (idiom); don't despair and you will find a way through./Never give up hope./Never say die.
pinyin: tian1 wu2 jue2 ren2 zhi1 lu4

definition: lit. when the boat gets to the pier-head, it will go straight with the current (proverb)/fig. everything will be all right/cf 車到山前必有路，船到橋頭自然直|车到山前必有路，船到桥头自然直
pinyin: chuan2 dao4 qiao2 tou2 zi4 ran2 zhi2

definition: to bless and protect/blessing
to console/to soothe/relieved
to just escape from calamity
